name: Great Canadian Burger
description: Beef and grain are the staples of our heartland. Adding oats to your burger helps stretch that grocery dollar, acts as a binder to help hold ingredients together when cooking and lends a softer texture.

ingredients.name: Honey Mustard or Sweet & Spicy Mustard
Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning

preparation: Preheat grill to medium-high. Brush with oil to prevent sticking.
Combine all ingredients and mix well.
With water-moistened hands, form mixture into 6 patties, each about 1” thick, or prepare burgers using 3-in-1 Burger Press.
Grill patties, with lid closed, 4–5 min per side, or until cooked through.
Tuck patties into buns and add toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Honey Mustard
summary: A bold twist on a classic condiment made with 100% Canadian mustard seed and organic honey.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: 3-in-1 Burger Press
summary: Press perfectly shaped patties, stuffed burgers, and sliders with this non-stick 3-in-1 Burger Press. A great addition to a build-your-own-burger bar, switch up the protein – try beef, chicken, turkey, salmon, or veg – and fillings to make your burger your way!
